mapper.insert: INSERT INTO clazz (name, description, start_year, end_year, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{name}, #{description}, #{startYear}, #{endYear}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, description, start_year, end_year, create_time, update_time FROM clazz ORDER BY create_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE clazz SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, start_year = #{startYear}, end_year = #{endYear}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
